subject: Wheel for Rally SIM's Required
description_text:
Hi there,

Pease could I confirm that with https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-steering-wheel-s1?variant=50349670531386 is a complete solution to play rally titles? With this, I get the wheel, button box all included? In other words, this is all I need to plug into my PC via USB and operate this wheel for rally titles.

Kind regards,

Marcus

conversations.body_text: Hi Marcus Brooks,  Yes, it includes both the steering wheel and the hub button module. If you already have a quick release (QR) and the bolt pattern is 70 mm, there’s no need to purchase an additional QR. Otherwise, you’ll need to use a QR adapter.

OK perfect.

I will purchase today.

Thank you ?
________________________________
